roleset.name: to make susceptible, be susceptible to

example.name: all arguments
example.text: The scientists say that since breast cancer often strikes multiple members of certain families , the gene , when [*] inherited in a damaged form [*T*], may predispose women to the cancer .
example.arg: the gene , when [*] inherited in a damaged form

example.name: both args
example.text: her genetic predisposition to breast cancer
